  <h1 align="center">Sanity SDK</h1>

Core utilities for creating Sanity applications.

## 💻 Installation

```bash
npm i @sanity/sdk
```

## 📚 SDK Documentation

See the [SDK Documentation](https://sdk-docs.sanity.dev) for more information.

## 🧑‍💻 Implementations

- [React](https://www.npmjs.com/package/@sanity/sdk-react)
